game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the depths of the jungle.
game.description: You've heard rumors of a mysterious artifact buried deep within an uncharted forest. Your quest is to locate it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ancient ruins
task.description: You've been told that the ruins are hidden behind a waterfall in the heart of the jungle. Find it and enter.

task.objective: Solve the puzzle to unlock the artifact chamber
task.description: Once inside the ruins, you'll encounter a series of puzzles that need to be solved to reach the artifact.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact and escape the jungle
task.description: The artifact is said to be in a sealed chamber. Once you have it, navigate your way back through the jungle and return to the quest giver.
